field.name: summary
field.value: IWindsorContainer.AddComponentInstance<T>(Type t, object component) is not scoped to container.

field.name: description
field.value:
When adding a component instance to child container where the parent container already has an instance registered for the same type, the child container always resolves to the parent container instance.
Hence, scoped overrides fails for registered instances. i.e.
Component parentComponent = new Component(); Component childComponent = new Component();
parentContainer.AddComponentInstance<T>(typeof(T), parentComponent) childContainer.AddComponentInstance<T>(typeof(T), childComponent)
childContainer.Resolve<T>() == parentContainer.Resolve<I>() returns true, when it should return false. childContainer.Resolve<T>() == childComponent returns false, when it should return true.
